name: TO FIGHT FOR THE RIGHT TO FIGHT THE FAR RIGHT
description: What was once relegated to the sidelines of fringe conversations amongst small cabals of hate, now has been unleashed like a wild fire onto a country reeling from social/racial/economic injustices. TO FIGHT FOR THE RIGHT TO FIGHT THE FAR RIGHT, is work that speaks truth to many, many virtues in life; none more so than, cooperation. Hate should have no safe harbor in our hearts and minds. We can stand together and stamp out hate from the far-right. In whatever form it takes, there needs to be: patience, compassion, integrity, courage, trust, and wisdom to name a few. We need to be the healthy alternative to show what life outside of a hate filled cult is like; an open invitation to love again. Also, when I use the term fight, I don't mean literally fighting as that would be stooping down to their level of depravity; it's fighting using love. Love always wins; always in all ways.
